name: Educated Public
description: The public is more educated about the virus, making them less likely to panic, and take precaution against the virus.

name: Curfew
description: Rules are layed out requiring people to stay indoor at night. This reduction in human activity and interaction reduces the risk of virus spreading, but will cause many industries to take a hit financially.

name: Foreign Influence
description: Some foreign countires are using the situation as a way to attack your government's reputation.

name: Friendly Neighbour
description: Your neighbouring country holds a friendly attitude towards your government, leading to improved trades.

name: Rationalized Toiler Paper
description: Toilet paper sale is limited to 1 roll per person per day to prevent hoarding.

name: Failed State
description: Your government collapsed under your rule. The society as you knew it no longer exists, as rebel leaders organize their armies to fight over control of the land. With foreign powers meddling with the civil war, you can foresee the dark future that awaits your people. What about the pandemic? Well, it's not nearly as deadly as the war.

name: Infectious Goods
description: Potentially infected goods are being let through the border.

name: Temporary Hospital
description: Additional hospitals around the country relieves pressure from medical staffs, but they are expensive to build and run.

name: Museum Hospital
description: Museums are being used to situate infected patients with only mild symptoms.

name: Power of memes
description: Your relaxed gestures and joking speeches make your citizen think that you have everything in control.

name: Power of anime
description: People are staying home a lot more now to watch free anime, resulting in reduced human contact.
